name: 曾恕銘
objective: 1.機率理論基礎 2.隨機變數之產生 3.隨機過程基礎 4.Markovian 排隊系統分析 5.Semi-Markovian 排隊系統分析 6.開放及封閉型排隊網路分析 7.隨機存取/網路系統之效能分析 8.系統輸入模式之建立 9.交換網路之模型建立與分析
schedule:
1.　　Introduction to queueing
2.　　Probability Theory and Statistics Theory
3.　　Traffic model 
Poisson arrival process
Exponential interarrival times
Memoryless and merging properties
4.　　Basic Queuing models
Kendall’s notatopn
Little’s law
birth-death process
M/M/1 queuing model
M/M/- queuing model
5.　　CDMA Pure ALOHA JSAC96 (M/D/infinity)
6.　　CDMA Pure ALOHA JSAC01
7.　　(optional) Markovian arrival process (MAP), Markovian modulated Poisson process (MMPP)
